entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
